title: Dark Artist armor
summaries: Dark Artist armor is a Hardmode, post-Golem armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 1500000*150 [img:Defender Medal] in total, and provides summon as well as magic damage bonuses. The set consists of the Dark Artist's Hat, Dark Artist's Robes, and Dark Artist's Leggings.
A full set of Dark Artist armor will provide the following stats:

• +42 defense
  • +25% magic damage
  • +60% summon damage
  • +25% magic critical strike chance
  • +15% mana cost reduction
  • +20% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack range of <linked>Flameburst sentry summons</linked> by 50%, allowing them to attack up to 84 tiles away. It also increases their projectiles' <linked>velocity</linked> by 40%, increases projectiles' explosion area from 6×6 to 13×13-tile rectangle, and increases these sentries' field of view significantly.
Wearing the full set also increases the explosion area of the <linked>Phantom Phoenix</linked>'s Phoenix projectile from 6×6 to 13×13-tile rectangle.
The Dark Artist armor can be considered a direct upgrade of the <linked>Apprentice armor</linked>.

statistics.Set Bonus:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Flameburst effectiveness
statistics.Buy: 150 [img:Defender Medal] (set)
statistics.Sell: 9 GC (set)
